root.sql: create or replace view v_ass_chk_in_main as select '02' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, ASS_IN_NO, STORE_ID, STORE_NO, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NO, ASS_PURPOSE, PROJ_ID, PROJ_NO, IN_MONEY, NOTE, CREATE_EMP, CREATE_DATE, IN_DATE, CONFIRM_EMP, STATE from ASS_CHK_IN_MAIN_SPECIAL t union all select '03' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, ASS_IN_NO, STORE_ID, STORE_NO, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NO, ASS_PURPOSE, PROJ_ID, PROJ_NO, IN_MONEY, NOTE, CREATE_EMP, CREATE_DATE, IN_DATE, CONFIRM_EMP, STATE from ASS_CHK_IN_MAIN_GENERAL t union all select '01' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, ASS_IN_NO, null STORE_ID, null STORE_NO, null DEPT_ID, null DEPT_NO, ASS_PURPOSE, PROJ_ID, PROJ_NO, IN_MONEY, NOTE, CREATE_EMP, CREATE_DATE, IN_DATE, CONFIRM_EMP, STATE from ASS_CHK_IN_MAIN_HOUSE t union all select '04' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, ASS_IN_NO, STORE_ID, STORE_NO, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NO, ASS_PURPOSE, PROJ_ID, PROJ_NO, IN_MONEY, NOTE, CREATE_EMP, CREATE_DATE, IN_DATE, CONFIRM_EMP, STATE from ASS_CHK_IN_MAIN_OTHER t union all select '05' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, ASS_IN_NO, STORE_ID, STORE_NO, DEPT_ID, DEPT_NO, ASS_PURPOSE, PROJ_ID, PROJ_NO, IN_MONEY, NOTE, CREATE_EMP, CREATE_DATE, IN_DATE, CONFIRM_EMP, STATE from ASS_CHK_IN_MAIN_INASSETS t union all select '06' ass_naturs,GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, ASS_IN_NO, null STORE_ID, null STORE_NO, null DEPT_ID, null DEPT_NO, ASS_PURPOSE, PROJ_ID, PROJ_NO, IN_MONEY, NOTE, CREATE_EMP, CREATE_DATE, IN_DATE, CONFIRM_EMP, STATE from ASS_CHK_IN_MAIN_LAND t

sql.desc: 盘盈入库明细表表视图

root.sql: create or replace view v_ass_chk_in_detail as select '02' ass_naturs, GROUP_ID, HOS_ID, COPY_CODE, ASS_IN_NO, ASS_ID, ASS_NO, to_char(ASS_SPEC) as ASS_SPEC, to_char(ASS_MODEL) as ASS_MODEL, to_char(ASS_BRAND)as ASS_BRAND, FAC_ID, FAC_NO, UNIT_CODE, IN_AMOUNT, PRICE, ADD_DEPRE, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, NOTE from ASS_CHK_IN_DETAIL_SPECIAL t union all select '03' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code, ASS_IN_NO, ASS_ID, ASS_NO, to_char(ASS_SPEC) as ASS_SPEC, to_char(ASS_MODEL) as ASS_MODEL, to_char(ASS_BRAND)as ASS_BRAND, FAC_ID, FAC_NO, UNIT_CODE, IN_AMOUNT, PRICE, ADD_DEPRE, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, NOTE from ASS_CHK_IN_DETAIL_GENERAL t union all select '01' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code, ASS_IN_NO, ASS_ID, ASS_NO, '' ASS_SPEC, '' ASS_MODEL, '' ASS_BRAND, null FAC_ID, null FAC_NO, '' UNIT_CODE, IN_AMOUNT, PRICE, ADD_DEPRE, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, NOTE from ASS_CHK_IN_DETAIL_HOUSE t union all select '04' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code, ASS_IN_NO, ASS_ID, ASS_NO, to_char(ASS_SPEC) as ASS_SPEC, to_char(ASS_MODEL) as ASS_MODEL, to_char(ASS_BRAND)as ASS_BRAND, FAC_ID, FAC_NO, UNIT_CODE, IN_AMOUNT, PRICE, ADD_DEPRE, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, NOTE from ASS_CHK_IN_DETAIL_OTHER t union all select '05' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code, ASS_IN_NO, ASS_ID, ASS_NO, to_char(ASS_SPEC) as ASS_SPEC, to_char(ASS_MODEL) as ASS_MODEL, to_char(ASS_BRAND)as ASS_BRAND, FAC_ID, FAC_NO, UNIT_CODE, IN_AMOUNT, PRICE, ADD_DEPRE, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, NOTE from ASS_CHK_IN_DETAIL_INASSETS t union all select '06' ass_naturs,t.group_id,t.hos_id,t.copy_code, ASS_IN_NO, ASS_ID, ASS_NO, '' ASS_SPEC, '' ASS_MODEL, '' ASS_BRAND, null FAC_ID, null FAC_NO, '' UNIT_CODE, IN_AMOUNT, PRICE, ADD_DEPRE, ADD_DEPRE_MONTH, CUR_MONEY, FORE_MONEY, NOTE from ASS_CHK_IN_DETAIL_LAND t
